mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from saleboard WHERE sale_category LIKE DECODE(#{sale_category}, '*', '%', #{sale_category}) order by sale_seq desc) tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
select location_dong from locationconfirm where member_id=#{member_id}
select member_reputation from applemarket where member_id=#{member_id}

select * from saleboard where
member_id like '%'|| #{value} ||'%'
sale_subject like '%'|| #{value}|| '%'
sale_content like '%'|| #{value} '%'
mapper.insert: insert into saleboard ( sale_subject, sale_price, sale_nego_YN, sale_category, sale_content, member_id, sale_logtime, sale_image1, sale_image2, sale_image3, sale_image4, sale_image5, member_profilePic, location_dong, sale_free_YN, sale_ad_YN, member_reputation, sale_seq) values( #{sale_subject}, #{sale_price}, #{sale_nego_YN}, #{sale_category}, #{sale_content}, #{member_id}, sysdate, #{sale_image1}, #{sale_image2}, #{sale_image3}, #{sale_image4}, #{sale_image5}, #{member_profilePic}, #{location_dong}, #{sale_free_YN}, #{sale_ad_YN}, #{member_reputation}, seq_sale.nextval )
mapper.select: select * from saleboard where member_id=#{member_id} and sale_seq != #{sale_seq} order by sale_seq desc
mapper.update: update saleboard set sale_heart_count = sale_heart_count + 1 where sale_seq = #{sale_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into interestList (interestList_seq, member_id, sale_seq, sale_status, sale_subject, sale_price, sale_logtime, sale_image1) values(seq_interestList.nextval, #{member_id}, #{sale_seq}, #{sale_status}, #{sale_subject}, #{sale_price}, #{sale_logtime}, #{sale_image1} )
mapper.update: update saleboard set sale_heart_count = sale_heart_count - 1 where sale_seq = #{sale_seq}
mapper.delete: delete from interestList where member_id = #{member_id} and sale_seq = #{sale_seq}
mapper.update: update saleboard set sale_hit = sale_hit + 1 where sale_seq = #{sale_seq}
mapper.select: select * from interestList where sale_seq=#{sale_seq} and member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.update: update interestList set sale_status=#{sale_status}, sale_subject=#{sale_subject}, sale_price=#{sale_price}, sale_logtime=#{sale_logtime}, sale_image1=#{sale_image1} where sale_seq=#{sale_seq} and member_id=#{member_id}
